description_for_human: Manage your service business â€” view schedule, book appointments, track clients, and check earnings.
description_for_model: Halo Assistant is a business management tool for service professionals (tutors, barbers, coaches, trainers, etc.). Use this plugin to: view today's or any date's appointment schedule, book new appointments, mark appointments as completed or cancelled, list and search clients, add new clients, view business statistics and financial summaries including revenue by service, expenses by category, and net earnings. All data is scoped to the authenticated user's business.
